name: 黃聲東
objective: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
schedule:
Weeks	Dates	Content
1	9/17, 9/18    	Introduction
2	9/24, 9/25   	Chapter 2 Fundamentals of Chemistry
3	9/29, 10/1	        Chapter 3 Gases
4	10/7, 10/8	        Chapter 3 Gases
5	10/14, 10/15	Chapter 4 Chemical Equilibrium
6	10/21,              Exam I (Chapter 2 and 3)
        10/22	       Chapter 4 Chemical Equilibrium
7	10/28, 10/29	Chapter 5 Acid and Base
8	11/4, 11/5	       Chapter 5 Acid and Base
9	11/11, 11/12	Chapter 6 Applications of Aqueous Equilibria
10	11/18, 11/19	Chapter 6 Applications of Aqueous Equilibria
11	11/25,               Exam II (Chapter 4-7)
       11/26    	       Chapter 7 Energy, Enthalpy, and Thermochemistry 
12	12/2, 12/3	       Chapter 7 Energy, Enthalpy, and Thermochemistry
13	12/9, 12/10	Chapter 7 Energy, Enthalpy, and Thermochemistry
14	12/16, 12/17	Chapter 8 Spontaneity, Entropy, and Free Energy
15	12/23, 12/24	Chapter 8 Spontaneity, Entropy, and Free Energy
16	12/30, 12/31	Chapter 8 Spontaneity, Entropy, and Free Energy
17	1/6, 1/7	        Exam III (Chapter 7 and 8)
18	1/14, 1/15	Classes End
scorePolicy:
所有考試題目都是英文出題，可使用翻譯機或字典及計算機。
Exam I (30%); Exam II (30%); Exam III (30%); Attendance (10 %) 
及格分數為60分 
考試未出席且未請假，分數為0分計算。
考試請假只有1次機會且不補考，成績由其他2次考試分數平均計算
materials: Steven S. Zumdahl, Donald J. DeCoste, Hsiu-Fu Hsu, Principles of Chemistry, 2014, CENGAGE Learning Asia Pte Ltd
